data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during LUCIPARAS cruise from Banjoewangi to Nieuwediep started at 1848-01-31
Ship: Lucipara'S, Voyage: Banjoewangi - Nieuwediep, 1st Observer: C. Visman (Kapitein)
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
